comments:
I'm getting a 404 on an update site - but this has been happening since I downloaded and installed Callisto release version --- here's the info as it appears in the Error pop up within Eclipse and below it is the Error log as written to .metadata/.log

GMF is showing a "Not Installed Properly" in Manage Configuration - however, all sub elements are showing fine.

I'm running Linux RH FC5 on a P4 2.8GHz HT with 2Gb

======================

> Server returned HTTP response code: "404 Not Found" for URL:
This is a server problem, not update client. I tried URLs from your log (in browser) and they do not exist so the problem is definitely not in update.
